attributes.action: make all portrayals of female on male abuse illegal.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Female on male abuse (slapping the face, hitting during a fight, etcetera) is shown on television, even during 'domestic abuse' features on news broadcasts, as justifiable. Moreover, such instances are included in regular television shows, as if a woman striking a man is okay whereas a man striking a woman in self defence or even in rage is not. This must stop.
